resources.string: Rolled dice with certain number up

This is a text 

with many 

newlines 

I love making fire with my magic wand. I am a fire wizard after all! 

I fought the Balgrog of Ugul from the core of the earth to the top of the earth. After that I went to get a healthy breakfast at my favorite restaurant. I did fight the Balrog for several days that felt like several weeks so I was obviously starving. I hear the Hobbits have tasty breakfasts. 

Then a Hobbit came to me and said: "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."
Android Trivia will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in Android development.\n\nConsider modifying the questions and graphics to make this game your own!

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
